Sql.query: insert into prn_mediciongrp( grupocodi, prnmgrtipo, medifecha, vergrpcodi, prnmgrpadre, meditotal, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, prnmgrusucreacion, prnmgrfeccreacion, prnmgrusumodificacion, prnmgrfecmodificacion ) values ( :grupocodi, :prnmgrtipo, :medifecha, :vergrpcodi, :prnmgrpadre, :meditotal, :H1, :H2, :H3, :H4, :H5, :H6, :H7, :H8, :H9, :H10, :H11, :H12, :H13, :H14, :H15, :H16, :H17, :H18, :H19, :H20, :H21, :H22, :H23, :H24, :H25, :H26, :H27, :H28, :H29, :H30, :H31, :H32, :H33, :H34, :H35, :H36, :H37, :H38, :H39, :H40, :H41, :H42, :H43, :H44, :H45, :H46, :H47, :H48, :prnmgrusucreacion, :prnmgrfeccreacion, :prnmgrusumodificacion, :prnmgrfecmodificacion )

update prn_mediciongrp set meditotal = :meditotal, H1 = :H1, H2 = :H2, H3 = :H3, H4 = :H4, H5 = :H5, H6 = :H6, H7 = :H7, H8 = :H8, H9 = :H9, H10 = :H10, H11 = :H11, H12 = :H12, H13 = :H13, H14 = :H14, H15 = :H15, H16 = :H16, H17 = :H17, H18 = :H18, H19 = :H19, H20 = :H20, H21 = :H21, H22 = :H22, H23 = :H23, H24 = :H24, H25 = :H25, H26 = :H26, H27 = :H27, H28 = :H28, H29 = :H29, H30 = :H30, H31 = :H31, H32 = :H32, H33 = :H33, H34 = :H34, H35 = :H35, H36 = :H36, H37 = :H37, H38 = :H38, H39 = :H39, H40 = :H40, H41 = :H41, H42 = :H42, H43 = :H43, H44 = :H44, H45 = :H45, H46 = :H46, H47 = :H47, H48 = :H48, prnmgrusumodificacion = :prnmgrusumodificacion, prnmgrfecmodificacion = :prnmgrfecmodificacion where grupocodi = :grupocodi and prnmgrtipo = :prnmgrtipo and medifecha = :medifecha and vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi and prnmgrpadre = :prnmgrpadre
delete from prn_mediciongrp where grupocodi = :grupocodi and prnmgrtipo = :prnmgrtipo and medifecha = :medifecha and vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi
select * from prn_mediciongrp where grupocodi = :grupocodi and prnmgrtipo = :prnmgrtipo and medifecha = :medifecha and vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi
select * from prn_mediciongrp
delete from prn_mediciongrp where grupocodi = :grupocodi and prnmgrtipo = :prnmgrtipo

select gr.grupocodi, gr.gruponomb, med.H1, med.H2, med.H3, med.H4, med.H5, med.H6, med.H7, med.H8, med.H9, med.H10, med.H11, med.H12, med.H13, med.H14, med.H15, med.H16, med.H17, med.H18, med.H19, med.H20, med.H21, med.H22, med.H23, med.H24, med.H25, med.H26, med.H27, med.H28, med.H29, med.H30, med.H31, med.H32, med.H33, med.H34, med.H35, med.H36, med.H37, med.H38, med.H39, med.H40, med.H41, med.H42, med.H43, med.H44, med.H45, med.H46, med.H47, med.H48 from (select grupocodi, gruponomb from (select distinct red.prnredbarrapm from prn_reduccionred red join prn_version ver on red.prnvercodi = ver.prnvercodi where ver.prnverestado = 'A' and (red.prnredbarracp in ({2}) or '0' = '{2}')) tb1 left join (select grupocodi, gruponomb from pr_grupo where catecodi = 10) tb2 on tb1.prnredbarrapm = tb2.grupocodi) gr left join ( select grupocodi, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48 from prn_mediciongrp where prnmgrtipo = {1} ) med on gr.grupocodi = med.grupocodi where (gr.grupocodi in ({0}) or '0' = '{0}')

select medifecha, sum(H1) H1, sum(H2) H2, sum(H3) H3, sum(H4) H4, sum(H5) H5, sum(H6) H6, sum(H7) H7, sum(H8) H8, sum(H9) H9, sum(H10) H10, sum(H11) H11, sum(H12) H12, sum(H13) H13, sum(H14) H14, sum(H15) H15, sum(H16) H16, sum(H17) H17, sum(H18) H18, sum(H19) H19, sum(H20) H20, sum(H21) H21, sum(H22) H22, sum(H23) H23, sum(H24) H24, sum(H25) H25, sum(H26) H26, sum(H27) H27, sum(H28) H28, sum(H29) H29, sum(H30) H30, sum(H31) H31, sum(H32) H32, sum(H33) H33, sum(H34) H34, sum(H35) H35, sum(H36) H36, sum(H37) H37, sum(H38) H38, sum(H39) H39, sum(H40) H40, sum(H41) H41, sum(H42) H42, sum(H43) H43, sum(H44) H44, sum(H45) H45, sum(H46) H46, sum(H47) H47, sum(H48) H48 from prn_mediciongrp med join ( select distinct rd.prnredbarracp from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi where re.areapadre = {0} ) qr on med.grupocodi = qr.prnredbarracp where med.medifecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and med.prnmgrtipo in ({2}) and med.vergrpcodi = {3} group by medifecha

select tab1.areapadre, mgr.medifecha, nvl(sum(mgr.H1), 0) H1, nvl(sum(mgr.H2), 0) H2, nvl(sum(mgr.H3), 0) H3, nvl(sum(mgr.H4), 0) H4, nvl(sum(mgr.H5), 0) H5, nvl(sum(mgr.H6), 0) H6, nvl(sum(mgr.H7), 0) H7, nvl(sum(mgr.H8), 0) H8, nvl(sum(mgr.H9), 0) H9, nvl(sum(mgr.H10), 0) H10, nvl(sum(mgr.H11), 0) H11, nvl(sum(mgr.H12), 0) H12, nvl(sum(mgr.H13), 0) H13, nvl(sum(mgr.H14), 0) H14, nvl(sum(mgr.H15), 0) H15, nvl(sum(mgr.H16), 0) H16, nvl(sum(mgr.H17), 0) H17, nvl(sum(mgr.H18), 0) H18, nvl(sum(mgr.H19), 0) H19, nvl(sum(mgr.H20), 0) H20, nvl(sum(mgr.H21), 0) H21, nvl(sum(mgr.H22), 0) H22, nvl(sum(mgr.H23), 0) H23, nvl(sum(mgr.H24), 0) H24, nvl(sum(mgr.H25), 0) H25, nvl(sum(mgr.H26), 0) H26, nvl(sum(mgr.H27), 0) H27, nvl(sum(mgr.H28), 0) H28, nvl(sum(mgr.H29), 0) H29, nvl(sum(mgr.H30), 0) H30, nvl(sum(mgr.H31), 0) H31, nvl(sum(mgr.H32), 0) H32, nvl(sum(mgr.H33), 0) H33, nvl(sum(mgr.H34), 0) H34, nvl(sum(mgr.H35), 0) H35, nvl(sum(mgr.H36), 0) H36, nvl(sum(mgr.H37), 0) H37, nvl(sum(mgr.H38), 0) H38, nvl(sum(mgr.H39), 0) H39, nvl(sum(mgr.H40), 0) H40, nvl(sum(mgr.H41), 0) H41, nvl(sum(mgr.H42), 0) H42, nvl(sum(mgr.H43), 0) H43, nvl(sum(mgr.H44), 0) H44, nvl(sum(mgr.H45), 0) H45, nvl(sum(mgr.H46), 0) H46, nvl(sum(mgr.H47), 0) H47, nvl(sum(mgr.H48), 0) H48 from (select distinct rd.prnredbarracp, gr.gruponomb, re.areapadre from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi and re.areapadre in (2,3,5,6)) tab1 inner join prn_mediciongrp mgr on tab1.prnredbarracp = mgr.grupocodi where mgr.medifecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and mgr.prnmgrtipo in (1,2,9,10) and mgr.vergrpcodi = {2} group by mgr.MEDIFECHA, tab1.areapadre

select mgr.grupocodi, tab1.gruponomb, mgr.prnmgrtipo, mgr.medifecha, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17,h18, h19,h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from (select distinct rd.prnredbarracp, gr.gruponomb from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi and re.areapadre = {2}) tab1 inner join prn_mediciongrp mgr on tab1.prnredbarracp = mgr.grupocodi where mgr.medifecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and mgr.prnmgrtipo in (4,5) and mgr.vergrpcodi = {3} UNION ALL select mgr.grupocodi, tab1.gruponomb, 1 PRNMGRTIPO, mgr.medifecha, nvl(sum(mgr.H1), 0) H1, nvl(sum(mgr.H2), 0) H2, nvl(sum(mgr.H3), 0) H3, nvl(sum(mgr.H4), 0) H4, nvl(sum(mgr.H5), 0) H5, nvl(sum(mgr.H6), 0) H6, nvl(sum(mgr.H7), 0) H7, nvl(sum(mgr.H8), 0) H8, nvl(sum(mgr.H9), 0) H9, nvl(sum(mgr.H10), 0) H10, nvl(sum(mgr.H11), 0) H11, nvl(sum(mgr.H12), 0) H12, nvl(sum(mgr.H13), 0) H13, nvl(sum(mgr.H14), 0) H14, nvl(sum(mgr.H15), 0) H15, nvl(sum(mgr.H16), 0) H16, nvl(sum(mgr.H17), 0) H17, nvl(sum(mgr.H18), 0) H18, nvl(sum(mgr.H19), 0) H19, nvl(sum(mgr.H20), 0) H20, nvl(sum(mgr.H21), 0) H21, nvl(sum(mgr.H22), 0) H22, nvl(sum(mgr.H23), 0) H23, nvl(sum(mgr.H24), 0) H24, nvl(sum(mgr.H25), 0) H25, nvl(sum(mgr.H26), 0) H26, nvl(sum(mgr.H27), 0) H27, nvl(sum(mgr.H28), 0) H28, nvl(sum(mgr.H29), 0) H29, nvl(sum(mgr.H30), 0) H30, nvl(sum(mgr.H31), 0) H31, nvl(sum(mgr.H32), 0) H32, nvl(sum(mgr.H33), 0) H33, nvl(sum(mgr.H34), 0) H34, nvl(sum(mgr.H35), 0) H35, nvl(sum(mgr.H36), 0) H36, nvl(sum(mgr.H37), 0) H37, nvl(sum(mgr.H38), 0) H38, nvl(sum(mgr.H39), 0) H39, nvl(sum(mgr.H40), 0) H40, nvl(sum(mgr.H41), 0) H41, nvl(sum(mgr.H42), 0) H42, nvl(sum(mgr.H43), 0) H43, nvl(sum(mgr.H44), 0) H44, nvl(sum(mgr.H45), 0) H45, nvl(sum(mgr.H46), 0) H46, nvl(sum(mgr.H47), 0) H47, nvl(sum(mgr.H48), 0) H48 from (select distinct rd.prnredbarracp, gr.gruponomb from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi and re.areapadre = {2}) tab1 inner join prn_mediciongrp mgr on tab1.prnredbarracp = mgr.grupocodi where mgr.medifecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and mgr.prnmgrtipo in (1,2) and mgr.vergrpcodi = {3} group by mgr.grupocodi, tab1.gruponomb, mgr.MEDIFECHA UNION ALL select -1 GRUPOCODI, 'totales' GRUPONOMB, mgr.prnmgrtipo*-1, mgr.medifecha, nvl(sum(mgr.H1), 0) H1, nvl(sum(mgr.H2), 0) H2, nvl(sum(mgr.H3), 0) H3, nvl(sum(mgr.H4), 0) H4, nvl(sum(mgr.H5), 0) H5, nvl(sum(mgr.H6), 0) H6, nvl(sum(mgr.H7), 0) H7, nvl(sum(mgr.H8), 0) H8, nvl(sum(mgr.H9), 0) H9, nvl(sum(mgr.H10), 0) H10, nvl(sum(mgr.H11), 0) H11, nvl(sum(mgr.H12), 0) H12, nvl(sum(mgr.H13), 0) H13, nvl(sum(mgr.H14), 0) H14, nvl(sum(mgr.H15), 0) H15, nvl(sum(mgr.H16), 0) H16, nvl(sum(mgr.H17), 0) H17, nvl(sum(mgr.H18), 0) H18, nvl(sum(mgr.H19), 0) H19, nvl(sum(mgr.H20), 0) H20, nvl(sum(mgr.H21), 0) H21, nvl(sum(mgr.H22), 0) H22, nvl(sum(mgr.H23), 0) H23, nvl(sum(mgr.H24), 0) H24, nvl(sum(mgr.H25), 0) H25, nvl(sum(mgr.H26), 0) H26, nvl(sum(mgr.H27), 0) H27, nvl(sum(mgr.H28), 0) H28, nvl(sum(mgr.H29), 0) H29, nvl(sum(mgr.H30), 0) H30, nvl(sum(mgr.H31), 0) H31, nvl(sum(mgr.H32), 0) H32, nvl(sum(mgr.H33), 0) H33, nvl(sum(mgr.H34), 0) H34, nvl(sum(mgr.H35), 0) H35, nvl(sum(mgr.H36), 0) H36, nvl(sum(mgr.H37), 0) H37, nvl(sum(mgr.H38), 0) H38, nvl(sum(mgr.H39), 0) H39, nvl(sum(mgr.H40), 0) H40, nvl(sum(mgr.H41), 0) H41, nvl(sum(mgr.H42), 0) H42, nvl(sum(mgr.H43), 0) H43, nvl(sum(mgr.H44), 0) H44, nvl(sum(mgr.H45), 0) H45, nvl(sum(mgr.H46), 0) H46, nvl(sum(mgr.H47), 0) H47, nvl(sum(mgr.H48), 0) H48 from (select distinct rd.prnredbarracp, gr.gruponomb from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi and re.areapadre = {2}) tab1 inner join prn_mediciongrp mgr on tab1.prnredbarracp = mgr.grupocodi where mgr.medifecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and mgr.prnmgrtipo in (4,5) and mgr.vergrpcodi = {3} group by mgr.MEDIFECHA, mgr.prnmgrtipo

select distinct grp.grupocodi, pto.ptomedicodi, pto.emprcodi, grp.gruponomb, grp.catecodi, medgrp.medifecha, medgrp.meditotal, medgrp.vergrpcodi, medgrp.prnmgrusucreacion,medgrp.prnmgrfeccreacion,medgrp.prnmgrusumodificacion,medgrp.prnmgrfecmodificacion,medgrp.prnmgrtipo, medgrp.H1, medgrp.H2, medgrp.H3, medgrp.H4, medgrp.H5, medgrp.H6, medgrp.H7, medgrp.H8, medgrp.H9, medgrp.H10, medgrp.H11,medgrp.H12, medgrp.H13, medgrp.H14, medgrp.H15, medgrp.H16, medgrp.H17, medgrp.H18, medgrp.H19, medgrp.H20, medgrp.H21, medgrp.H22, medgrp.H23, medgrp.H24, medgrp.H25, medgrp.H26, medgrp.H27, medgrp.H28, medgrp.H29, medgrp.H30, medgrp.H31, medgrp.H32, medgrp.H33, medgrp.H34, medgrp.H35, medgrp.H36, medgrp.H37, medgrp.H38, medgrp.H39, medgrp.H40, medgrp.H41, medgrp.H42, medgrp.H43, medgrp.H44, medgrp.H45, medgrp.H46, medgrp.H47, medgrp.H48 from prn_reduccionred red join prn_version ves on red.prnvercodi = ves.prnvercodi and (ves.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo grp on red.prnredbarracp = grp.grupocodi join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.grupocodi = grp.grupocodi inner join me_hojaptomed hp on hp.ptomedicodi = pto.ptomedicodi and hp.formatcodi = 47 join prn_mediciongrp medgrp on grp.grupocodi = medgrp.grupocodi and (medgrp.prnmgrtipo = 1) where medgrp.medifecha >= to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and medgrp.medifecha < to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select count(grupocodi) grupocodi from prn_mediciongrp where prnmgrtipo = 1 and medifecha = to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY')

insert into prn_mediciongrp ( grupocodi, prnmgrtipo, medifecha, meditotal, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, prnmgrusucreacion, prnmgrfeccreacion, prnmgrusumodificacion, prnmgrfecmodificacion, vergrpcodi ) select grupocodi, prnmgrtipo, to_date('{3}','DD/MM/YYYY') medifecha, meditotal, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, prnmgrusucreacion, prnmgrfeccreacion, prnmgrusumodificacion, prnmgrfecmodificacion, {2} vergrpcodi from prn_mediciongrp where vergrpcodi = {0} and medifecha = to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
delete from prn_mediciongrp where vergrpcodi = {0}
select ptomedicodi, ptomedidesc, origlectcodi from me_ptomedicion where ptomedidesc = ( select ptomedidesc from me_ptomedicion where origlectcodi in (36, 37) and ptomedicodi = {0} )
select ptomedicodi, ptomedidesc, origlectcodi, codref from me_ptomedicion where origlectcodi in (36, 37) and codref = {0}

select {0} grupocodi, sum(H1) H1, sum(H2) H2, sum(H3) H3, sum(H4) H4, sum(H5) H5, sum(H6) H6, sum(H7) H7, sum(H8) H8, sum(H9) H9, sum(H10) H10, sum(H11) H11, sum(H12) H12, sum(H13) H13, sum(H14) H14, sum(H15) H15, sum(H16) H16, sum(H17) H17, sum(H18) H18, sum(H19) H19, sum(H20) H20, sum(H21) H21, sum(H22) H22, sum(H23) H23, sum(H24) H24, sum(H25) H25, sum(H26) H26, sum(H27) H27, sum(H28) H28, sum(H29) H29, sum(H30) H30, sum(H31) H31, sum(H32) H32, sum(H33) H33, sum(H34) H34, sum(H35) H35, sum(H36) H36, sum(H37) H37, sum(H38) H38, sum(H39) H39, sum(H40) H40, sum(H41) H41, sum(H42) H42, sum(H43) H43, sum(H44) H44, sum(H45) H45, sum(H46) H46, sum(H47) H47, sum(H48) H48 from prn_relaciontnadetalle tab1 join prn_mediciongrp tab2 on tab1.barracodi = tab2.grupocodi where tab1.reltnacodi = {0} and tab2.prnmgrtipo = {1} and tab2.medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and tab2.vergrpcodi = {3}

select {0} grupocodi, nvl(sum(H1),0) H1, nvl(sum(H2),0) H2, nvl(sum(H3),0) H3, nvl(sum(H4),0) H4, nvl(sum(H5),0) H5, nvl(sum(H6),0) H6, nvl(sum(H7),0) H7, nvl(sum(H8),0) H8, nvl(sum(H9),0) H9, nvl(sum(H10),0) H10, nvl(sum(H11),0) H11, nvl(sum(H12),0) H12, nvl(sum(H13),0) H13, nvl(sum(H14),0) H14, nvl(sum(H15),0) H15, nvl(sum(H16),0) H16, nvl(sum(H17),0) H17, nvl(sum(H18),0) H18, nvl(sum(H19),0) H19, nvl(sum(H20),0) H20, nvl(sum(H21),0) H21, nvl(sum(H22),0) H22, nvl(sum(H23),0) H23, nvl(sum(H24),0) H24, nvl(sum(H25),0) H25, nvl(sum(H26),0) H26, nvl(sum(H27),0) H27, nvl(sum(H28),0) H28, nvl(sum(H29),0) H29, nvl(sum(H30),0) H30, nvl(sum(H31),0) H31, nvl(sum(H32),0) H32, nvl(sum(H33),0) H33, nvl(sum(H34),0) H34, nvl(sum(H35),0) H35, nvl(sum(H36),0) H36, nvl(sum(H37),0) H37, nvl(sum(H38),0) H38, nvl(sum(H39),0) H39, nvl(sum(H40),0) H40, nvl(sum(H41),0) H41, nvl(sum(H42),0) H42, nvl(sum(H43),0) H43, nvl(sum(H44),0) H44, nvl(sum(H45),0) H45, nvl(sum(H46),0) H46, nvl(sum(H47),0) H47, nvl(sum(H48),0) H48 from prn_mediciongrp tab1 where tab1.grupocodi = {0} and tab1.prnmgrtipo = {1} and tab1.medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and tab1.vergrpcodi = {3}

select {0} grupocodi, nvl(sum(H1),0) H1, nvl(sum(H2),0) H2, nvl(sum(H3),0) H3, nvl(sum(H4),0) H4, nvl(sum(H5),0) H5, nvl(sum(H6),0) H6, nvl(sum(H7),0) H7, nvl(sum(H8),0) H8, nvl(sum(H9),0) H9, nvl(sum(H10),0) H10, nvl(sum(H11),0) H11, nvl(sum(H12),0) H12, nvl(sum(H13),0) H13, nvl(sum(H14),0) H14, nvl(sum(H15),0) H15, nvl(sum(H16),0) H16, nvl(sum(H17),0) H17, nvl(sum(H18),0) H18, nvl(sum(H19),0) H19, nvl(sum(H20),0) H20, nvl(sum(H21),0) H21, nvl(sum(H22),0) H22, nvl(sum(H23),0) H23, nvl(sum(H24),0) H24, nvl(sum(H25),0) H25, nvl(sum(H26),0) H26, nvl(sum(H27),0) H27, nvl(sum(H28),0) H28, nvl(sum(H29),0) H29, nvl(sum(H30),0) H30, nvl(sum(H31),0) H31, nvl(sum(H32),0) H32, nvl(sum(H33),0) H33, nvl(sum(H34),0) H34, nvl(sum(H35),0) H35, nvl(sum(H36),0) H36, nvl(sum(H37),0) H37, nvl(sum(H38),0) H38, nvl(sum(H39),0) H39, nvl(sum(H40),0) H40, nvl(sum(H41),0) H41, nvl(sum(H42),0) H42, nvl(sum(H43),0) H43, nvl(sum(H44),0) H44, nvl(sum(H45),0) H45, nvl(sum(H46),0) H46, nvl(sum(H47),0) H47, nvl(sum(H48),0) H48 from prn_mediciongrp tab1 where tab1.prnmgrpadre = {0} and tab1.prnmgrtipo = {1} and tab1.medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and tab1.vergrpcodi = {3}

select tab1.barracodi grupocodi, nvl(h1,0) h1, nvl(h2,0) h2, nvl(h3,0) h3, nvl(h4,0) h4, nvl(h5,0) h5, nvl(h6,0) h6, nvl(h7,0) h7, nvl(h8,0) h8, nvl(h9,0) h9, nvl(h10,0) h10, nvl(h11,0) h11, nvl(h12,0) h12, nvl(h13,0) h13, nvl(h14,0) h14, nvl(h15,0) h15, nvl(h16,0) h16, nvl(h17,0) h17, nvl(h18,0) h18, nvl(h19,0) h19, nvl(h20,0) h20, nvl(h21,0) h21, nvl(h22,0) h22, nvl(h23,0) h23, nvl(h24,0) h24, nvl(h25,0) h25, nvl(h26,0) h26, nvl(h27,0) h27, nvl(h28,0) h28, nvl(h29,0) h29, nvl(h30,0) h30, nvl(h31,0) h31, nvl(h32,0) h32, nvl(h33,0) h33, nvl(h34,0) h34, nvl(h35,0) h35, nvl(h36,0) h36, nvl(h37,0) h37, nvl(h38,0) h38, nvl(h39,0) h39, nvl(h40,0) h40, nvl(h41,0) h41, nvl(h42,0) h42, nvl(h43,0) h43, nvl(h44,0) h44, nvl(h45,0) h45, nvl(h46,0) h46, nvl(h47,0) h47, nvl(h48,0) h48 from (select barracodi from prn_relaciontnadetalle where reltnacodi = {0}) tab1 left join ( select * from prn_mediciongrp where prnmgrtipo = {1} and medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and vergrpcodi = {3} ) tab2 on tab1.barracodi = tab2.grupocodi

select tab1.barracodi grupocodi, nvl(h1,0) h1, nvl(h2,0) h2, nvl(h3,0) h3, nvl(h4,0) h4, nvl(h5,0) h5, nvl(h6,0) h6, nvl(h7,0) h7, nvl(h8,0) h8, nvl(h9,0) h9, nvl(h10,0) h10, nvl(h11,0) h11, nvl(h12,0) h12, nvl(h13,0) h13, nvl(h14,0) h14, nvl(h15,0) h15, nvl(h16,0) h16, nvl(h17,0) h17, nvl(h18,0) h18, nvl(h19,0) h19, nvl(h20,0) h20, nvl(h21,0) h21, nvl(h22,0) h22, nvl(h23,0) h23, nvl(h24,0) h24, nvl(h25,0) h25, nvl(h26,0) h26, nvl(h27,0) h27, nvl(h28,0) h28, nvl(h29,0) h29, nvl(h30,0) h30, nvl(h31,0) h31, nvl(h32,0) h32, nvl(h33,0) h33, nvl(h34,0) h34, nvl(h35,0) h35, nvl(h36,0) h36, nvl(h37,0) h37, nvl(h38,0) h38, nvl(h39,0) h39, nvl(h40,0) h40, nvl(h41,0) h41, nvl(h42,0) h42, nvl(h43,0) h43, nvl(h44,0) h44, nvl(h45,0) h45, nvl(h46,0) h46, nvl(h47,0) h47, nvl(h48,0) h48 from (select barracodi from prn_relaciontnadetalle where reltnacodi = {0}) tab1 left join ( select * from prn_mediciongrp where prnmgrtipo = {1} and medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and vergrpcodi = {3} and prnmgrpadre != {0} ) tab2 on tab1.barracodi = tab2.grupocodi

select medifecha, sum(H1) H1, sum(H2) H2, sum(H3) H3, sum(H4) H4, sum(H5) H5, sum(H6) H6, sum(H7) H7, sum(H8) H8, sum(H9) H9, sum(H10) H10, sum(H11) H11, sum(H12) H12, sum(H13) H13, sum(H14) H14, sum(H15) H15, sum(H16) H16, sum(H17) H17, sum(H18) H18, sum(H19) H19, sum(H20) H20, sum(H21) H21, sum(H22) H22, sum(H23) H23, sum(H24) H24, sum(H25) H25, sum(H26) H26, sum(H27) H27, sum(H28) H28, sum(H29) H29, sum(H30) H30, sum(H31) H31, sum(H32) H32, sum(H33) H33, sum(H34) H34, sum(H35) H35, sum(H36) H36, sum(H37) H37, sum(H38) H38, sum(H39) H39, sum(H40) H40, sum(H41) H41, sum(H42) H42, sum(H43) H43, sum(H44) H44, sum(H45) H45, sum(H46) H46, sum(H47) H47, sum(H48) H48 from prn_mediciongrp med join ( select distinct rd.prnredbarracp from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi where re.areapadre = {0} ) qr on med.grupocodi = qr.prnredbarracp where med.medifecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and med.prnmgrtipo in ({2}) and med.vergrpcodi = {3} group by medifecha

select grupocodi, sum(H1) H1, sum(H2) H2, sum(H3) H3, sum(H4) H4, sum(H5) H5, sum(H6) H6, sum(H7) H7, sum(H8) H8, sum(H9) H9, sum(H10) H10, sum(H11) H11, sum(H12) H12, sum(H13) H13, sum(H14) H14, sum(H15) H15, sum(H16) H16, sum(H17) H17, sum(H18) H18, sum(H19) H19, sum(H20) H20, sum(H21) H21, sum(H22) H22, sum(H23) H23, sum(H24) H24, sum(H25) H25, sum(H26) H26, sum(H27) H27, sum(H28) H28, sum(H29) H29, sum(H30) H30, sum(H31) H31, sum(H32) H32, sum(H33) H33, sum(H34) H34, sum(H35) H35, sum(H36) H36, sum(H37) H37, sum(H38) H38, sum(H39) H39, sum(H40) H40, sum(H41) H41, sum(H42) H42, sum(H43) H43, sum(H44) H44, sum(H45) H45, sum(H46) H46, sum(H47) H47, sum(H48) H48 from prn_mediciongrp med join ( select distinct rd.prnredbarracp from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi where re.areapadre = {0} ) qr on med.grupocodi = qr.prnredbarracp where med.medifecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and med.prnmgrtipo in ({2}) and med.vergrpcodi = {3} group by grupocodi
